model_answer: The visuals that show the uniqueness of each type of dog are the children gathered around a laptop with thought bubbles showing various dog breeds (option A) and the final frame displaying a collection of different dog illustrations (option C). The other two options (the boy watching TV and a man and a woman entering) do not relate specifically to the concept of dog breeds being unique.

The answer should be based on visual cues from the video. Please describe what you see on the screen when the woman mentions that Sprouts' videos are published under the Creative Commons license.

Answer: A: A woman in an orange shirt projecting a Creative Commons webpage to a group of children.
